//Arithmetic operations
000000000000000100000001 // ADD A=A+1 A=1
000010000000000111111111  //ADC A=A+255+Car A=0 C=1
000010000100000100000001 //ADC B=A+1+Car B=2 C=0
000100000000000100000001 //SUB A=A-1 A=255 Bor=1
000110000000000000000001 //SBB A=A-B-Bor A=252
001000000100000000000000 //INC B B=3
001010000100000000000000 //DEC B B=2
001100000100000000000000 //NEG B 
//Logical MISC ops
000000000001111100001010 //ADD A=Zeroreg + 10
000000000101111100000101 //ADD B=Zeroreg + 5
010000001000000000000001 //AND C= A & B
010010001100000000000001 //OR D= A || B
010100001100000000000000 //ROR D Reg Ans 10000111
010110001100000000000000 //ROL D Reg Ans 00001111
011000001100000000000000 //SHR D Reg Ans 00000111
011010001100000000000000 //SHL D Reg Ans 00001110
011100000000000000000100 //SET FLAG 0100
011110010000000000000000 //PUSH FLAF INTO E REG
//MACHINE CONTROL
110100000000000000010000 // SPC
000000000000000100000001 // ADD A=A+1 A=1
000010000000000111111111  //ADC A=A+255+Car A=0 C=1
000010000100000100000001 //ADC B=A+1+Car B=2 C=0
000100000000000100000001 //SUB A=A-1 A=255 Bor=1
000110000000000000000001 //SBB A=A-B-Bor A=252
001000000100000000000000 //INC B B=3
001010000100000000000000 //DEC B B=2
001100000100000000000000 //NEG B 
110110000000000000010000 // Restore PC with PCS
